channel.title: Hyperion Noob
channel.description: I am very new to Hyperion, and am testing my coding skills with Grahm's Hyperion base, I finally fixed the memory issue I was having, but I have another problem, where can I get a client for it?

item.title: Hyperion Noob
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Its for UID verification as well as other things.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Noob
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I love you guys! I would never have thought to use the mopar client, have not touched that thing in years! Now I’m excited, I don’t have to go by all the stuff sanity and all those guys made it, I can code it how I want

Mezzyscape562:

ye u need new source thats like an anti hack so it doesnt let people connect with cheat clients awsome eh?

That’s a cheat client? Or the server is just coming back thinking it is?

Read full topic

item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Use the mopar client if its the 317 revision.

item.title: Hyperion Noob
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:420920”]Ty, I have an error from the client, and the server D:, first issue.

Nov 07, 2011 7:20:57 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 2
Nov 07, 2011 7:20:59 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 102
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:01 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 15
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:43 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 118
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 14
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:47 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 71

Idk how to fix that…

And on the client side, it freezes after unzipping the “extra files” im not worried about that atm tho, I just want to log in…[/quote]
ye u need new source thats like an anti hack so it doesnt let people connect with cheat clients awsome eh?

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Noob
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ty, I have an error from the client, and the server D:, first issue.

Nov 07, 2011 7:20:57 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 2
Nov 07, 2011 7:20:59 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 102
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:01 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 15
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:43 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 118
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 14
Nov 07, 2011 7:21:47 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 71

Idk how to fix that…

And on the client side, it freezes after unzipping the “extra files” im not worried about that atm tho, I just want to log in…

Read full topic
